formatted_address: 820 Thomson Road, #01-03 Medical Centre A, Mount Alvernia Hospital, Singapore 574623
name: Timothy Lim Clinic for Women & Cancer Surgery

reviews.text: My wife has been on follow up with Dr Timothy since 2021 and throughout the years, he has been extremely professional and astute in his medical diagnoses and judgement. Would clearly discuss and explain management plans with us and also had pleasant experience with him delivering our 2 babies. He’s very experienced and does make plans in the best interest of his patients. Would recommend him especially for his gynaecological services.

From the moment I walked into the clinic, I felt welcomed.
The clinic is clean and waiting area is spacious, The clinic staff were friendly and efficient, and Dr Timothy lim himself was incredibly knowledgeable.

He is very professional , patience and friendly - He took his time to explain the necessary information and details to me , i felt assured and at ease for having him as my Gynae!

Overall, my experience with Dr Timothy Lim and His team (Ashlyn, Shima, Pinky and Faith) was exceptional, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend him to anyone in need of a gynecologist.

Thank you for providing such outstanding care! :)

Dr Lim has been my gynae for more than a decade. He was my gynae in KKH and followed him when he moved to private practice. He removed a huge blood cyst from my right ovary via open surgery when keyhole was aborted due to bad adhesion. Post surgery recovery was good and the external scar was hardly visible! Definitely very neat and careful doctor.

I’ve met Dr Timothy Lim a few times now, the first when I was introduced to him by another doctor due to surgery. I later had a few follow-ups with him - throughout my experiences with him, he was always gentle, professional, patient and would speak in simple terms so that I understood him. The receptionist ladies were always professional, polite and properly organized. Clinic was always clean, making me feel very comfortable as well. Thank you so much!

After experiencing unpleasant encounters with a few doctors, a student’s mum recommended Dr Timothy Lim.  I have been seeing Dr Timothy for 4+ years,
I find him to be a very ethical doctor, which is quite rare attribute nowadays.   He is a down to earth doctor that puts his patients interests first instead of profit.
Last year my third surgery was done by him, I am very impressed by his skill.  I had a very ugly and thick scar from the previous surgery by another Dr,  Dr Timothy fixed the scar after the surgery and the scar is neat and thin now! Recovery was fast under his tender care.
He is one of best dr that I have come across,  I would strongly recommend him.

vicinity: 820 Thomson Road, #01-03 Medical Centre A, Mount Alvernia Hospital
